[{'Item': '2.02', 'Content': 'Item 2.02.  Results of Operations and Financial Condition  
                                                             
On April 30, 2025, Microsoft Corporation issued a press release announcing its financial results for the fiscal
quarter ended March 31, 2025. A copy of the press release is furnished as Exhibit 99.1 to this report. In
accordance with General Instruction B.2 of Form 8-K, the information in this Current Report on Form 8-K, including
Exhibit 99.1, shall not be deemed to be “filed” for purposes of Section 18 of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934,
as amended (the “Exchange Act”), or otherwise subject to the liability of that section, and shall not be

as amended, or the Exchange Act, except as shall be expressly set forth by specific reference in such filing.', 'Matched Topics': ['Financial Updates', 'Product Announcements', 'Regulatory Changes']}]
